hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with nivolumab. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   nivolumab .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .
